addons.name: Video DownloadHelper
addons.description:
The easy way to download and convert Web videos from hundreds of YouTube-like sites.
This works also for audio and picture galleries.
addons.fullDescription:
DownloadHelper is a tool for web content extraction. Its purpose is to capture video and image files from many sites.

Just surf the Web as you are used to, when DownloadHelper detects it can do something for you, the icon gets animated and a menu allows you to download files by simply clicking an item

For instance, if you go to a YouTube page, you'll be able to download the video directly on your file system. It also works with MySpace, Google videos, DailyMotion, Porkolt, iFilm, DreamHost and others.

Since version 3.1, you can setup the extension to automatically convert the downloaded movies to your preferred video format.

When you are on a page containing links to images or movies, you can download some or all of them at once. Moving the mouse over the items in the menu will highlights the links directly in the page to make sure they are the ones you want to pick up.

DownloadHelper also allows you to download files one by one, so that you keep bandwidth to surf for other stuff to download.

To modify your preferences, like changing the download directory, right-click on the icon and choose "Preferences".

When you first install the extension, your browser is redirected to a welcome page with links to a user manual at http://www.downloadhelper.net/manual.php and a faq at http://www.downloadhelper.net/faq.php

This does not change your homepage setting and the welcome page won't appear anymore.

Support can be obtained from http://www.downloadhelper.net/support.php

***********************

Since May 2014, a spammer has been using Video DownloadHelper success to advertize for a trojan called Houlo in the addons.mozilla.com reviews. Be careful !!! Unfortunately, Mozilla does not seem to care much for scams :(
addons.developerComments:
Please, do not use comments as support forum.

If you have problems installing or using DownloadHelper, you should have a look at the following resources:

    the FAQ
    the manual
    the guide for video conversion


If you didn't find an answer from the links above, you can fill a support request from http://www.downloadhelper.net/support-expert.php

**********************************************************

TO THOSE WHO LIKE BLEEDING EDGE ADD-ON TECHNOLOGY:

Video DownloadHelper 4.9 includes a new beta feature: Direct Screen Capture

    - the feature grabs the video directly from the screen. Even if this method has some inconvenience compared to the network capture (the video must be played on your screen the whole duration of the capture), it makes Video DownloadHelper work on all sites, regardless of the underlying streaming protocol. You can also capture videos from a flash applet running in the page which was previously not possible. 


To enable that Screen Capture feature:

    make sure you are running at least Firefox 4.0. It won't work on previous versions. If you haven't already done so, upgrade your browser from http://www.getfirefox.com/
    open the Video DownloadHelper add-on preferences, section "Capture", tab "Screen Capture" and check the "Enable Screen capture" box
    once the screen capture has been setup, you'll see a new button next to the DownloadHelper toolbar icon. Click it to start the capture of the currently playing video. Click again to stop the capture and save the file. Alternatively, you can use the context menu (right-click in the page but outside the flash area) to choose the screen region to be captured


The Screen Capture feature relies on external tools to do the grabbing, therefore it depends on the platform you are running on:

    on Windows: you will have to also install the CSHelper add-on which provides a modified version of CamStudio. CSHelper and the software applications it contains are open sourced under the GPL license.
    on Linux, the feature relies by default on the "recordmydesktop" application. If you are running Ubuntu, you may have to do "sudo apt-get install recordmydesktop" to install that program. On other Linux distributions, you'll figure out. You also may want to use another screen grabbing utility like xvidcap or something else: please let us know about your setup if you succeed
    on Mac OS X, we haven't yet identified a suitable screen grabbing utility. If you are a Mac warrior and want to make some research on this, we'd love to hear from you

addons.name: English (South African) Language Pack
addons.description: Adds South African English language support to the Firefox browser. All interfaces will be translated into South African English.
addons.fullDescription:
Translation of the Firefox user interface into South African English by http://translate.org.za.

If you find missing translations or incorrect translations then visit http://pootle.translate.org.za and please contribute a correction.

addons.name: Qute 3++
addons.description:
Simple and unobtrusive theme with clear, colorful icons. Recreated using the icons from the original Qute 3 icon set.

View all versions
addons.fullDescription:
Most of the icons in this the theme were originally made by Arvid Axelsson. I started this theme because at the time, Qute 3 was not compatible with Firefox 3. But because there were too many changes from firefox 2 to 3, I ended up starting from the Firefox 3 default theme, and replacing most of the icons with the ones from Qute 3, including some customizations.

####################################################################
Due to the heavy UI changes in Firefox 29 I cannot maintain this theme any longer.
####################################################################
addons.developerComments: Due to the heavy UI changes in Firefox 29 I cannot maintain this theme any longer.

addons.name: Adblock Plus
addons.description:
Blocks annoying video ads on YouTube, Facebook ads, banners and much more.

Adblock Plus blocks all annoying ads, and supports websites by not blocking unobtrusive ads by default (configurable).
addons.fullDescription:
Adblock Plus allows you to regain control of the internet and view the web the way you want to. The add-on is supported by over forty filter subscriptions in dozens of languages which automatically configure it for purposes ranging from removing online advertising to blocking all known malware domains. Adblock Plus also allows you to customize your filters with the assistance of a variety of useful features, including a context option for images, a block tab for Flash and Java objects, and a list of blockable items to remove scripts and stylesheets.

Starting with Adblock Plus 2.0 there is an option in Filter Preferences to allow some non-intrusive advertising. The goal is to support websites using non-intrusive ways to advertise and to encourage more websites to do the same. Read more

screenshots.caption: Easily remove all annoying ads from Firefox.
Adblock Plus can do more than adblocking. Enable powerful features in one click.
Clean up your Facebook experience with Adblock Plus.
Adblock Plus even removes those annoying 30-second video ads on YouTube.
Browse the web as it once used to be.
Please help us by reporting bugs.
You can even create your own blocking lists to customize the web to your exact needs.

addons.name: Add to Search Bar
addons.description: Make any pages' search functionality available in the Search Bar (or "search box")...
addons.fullDescription:
Just make a right click (Ctrl+click on a Mac) with the mouse pointer on top of *the page's* search box and choose "Add to Search Bar..."

If you don't know how to use the extension, have a look at the second image - it's a screencast showing it in action.

screenshots.caption: Screencast explaining the usage of this extension

addons.name: ProxTube - Unblock YouTube
addons.description:
In some countries YouTube videos are blocked! Unblock them with this Addon.
Supported countries: Germany, Netherlands, Spain, ...? not US compatible
Status+Support: proxtube.com & Twitter: twitter.com/ProxTube (EN/DE)
addons.fullDescription:
With a click on the toolbar icon, you can activate and deactivate the addon.
If a YouTube video is blocked, it uses a proxy server to view the video.
On Leaving the site it deactivates the proxy.

screenshots.caption: ProxTube unblocks a blocked video in just a few seconds.
